item.title: Vibe coding company says Claude 4 reduced syntax errors by 25%
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: Lovable, which is a Vibe coding company, announced that Claude 4 has reduced its errors by 25% and made it faster by 40%. [...]

item.title: Leak suggests xAI is getting ready to ship Grok 3.5
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: xAI, founded by Elon Musk, is preparing to launch Grok 3.5, the company's next state-of-the-art AI model. [...]

item.title: ChatGPT Deep Research can now pull data from Dropbox and Box
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: You can now connect your Box and Dropbox accounts to Deep Research on ChatGPT and pull data, which will be used by the AI to conduct research. [...]

item.title: Researchers claim ChatGPT o3 bypassed shutdown in controlled test
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: A new report claims that OpenAI's o3 model altered a shutdown script to avoid being turned off, even when explicitly instructed to allow shutdown [...]

item.title: Glitch to end app hosting and user profiles on July 8
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Glitch has announced it is ending app hosting and user profiles on July 8, 2025, responding to changing market dynamics and extensive abuse problems that have raised operational costs. [...]

item.title: Fake Zenmap. WinMRT sites target IT staff with Bumblebee malware
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The Bumblebee malware SEO poisoning campaign uncovered earlier this week aimpersonating RVTools is using more typosquatting domainsi mimicking other popular open-source projects to infect devices used by IT staff. [...]

item.title: OpenAI confirms Operator Agent is now more accurate with o3
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: OpenAI says Operator Agent now uses the o3 model, which means it's now significantly better at reasoning capabilities. [...]

item.title: Dozens of malicious packages on NPM collect host and network data
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: 60 packages have been discovered in the NPM index that attempt to collect sensitive host and network data and send it to a Discord webhook controlled by the threat actor. [...]

item.title: Hacker steals $223 million in Cetus Protocol cryptocurrency heist
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The decentralized exchange Cetus Protocol announced that hackers have stolen $223 million in cryptocurrency and is offering a deal to stop all legal action if the funds are returned. [...]

item.title: FBI warns of Luna Moth extortion attacks targeting law firms
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The FBI warned that an extortion gang known as the Silent Ransom Group has been targeting U.S. law firms over the last two years in callback phishing and social engineering attacks. [...]

item.title: TikTok videos now push infostealer malware in ClickFix attacks
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Cybercriminals are using TikTok videos to trick users into infecting themselves with Vidar and StealC information-stealing malware in ClickFix attacks. [...]

item.title: Windows 11 Notepad gets AI-powered text writing capabilities
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft is testing a new AI-powered text generation feature in Notepad that can let Windows Insiders create content based on custom prompts. [...]
